= GWT in Action, 2nd Edition=
<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />
This site contains the source code for the book Google Web Toolkit (GWT) in Action - to be published by Manning in 2012.

You can find the source code for download under the *_Source_* tab.

Any known issues with the source code can be found under *_the Issues_* tab, and you can also that area to report any issues you find yourself.


The example code comes from the following chapters:

|| *Chapter* || *Title* || *Examples* ||
